# cpickr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of cpickr is to create input files for the DWR-GeM lab Hamilton Nimbus robots to use as input for cherrypicking samples from 96-well plates.

## Installation

You can install the development version of cpickr like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("DWR-CSI/cpickr")
```
